body:
After the renaming in #13411 using a previously installed environment doesn't work anymore, and I get `py-jupyter-notebook not found`. I think that is to be expected, however the fix requires a manual removal of `spack.lock` and a fixup in `spack.yaml`. At least the first one spack should be able to handle on its own and it should help me find the error in my environment specification

```
# anything before 13411
% spack create general
% spack add py-jupyter-notebook
% spack install
# update to after 13411
% spack env activate general
==> Error: Package 'py-jupyter-notebook' not found.
```
title: Renaming packages makes environment UI unusable
